website_summaries.verdict: With the addition of an Intel Core i9 processor, the sleek 15-inch MacBook Pro is now one of the most powerful desktop-replacement laptops you can buy, making it an excellent choice for well-heeled, on-the-go creative pros.
pros: Beautiful display with automatic color-temperature adjustment
cons: High starting price, and painfully expensive as configured

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: 2018 MacBook Pro packs so much power in an incredibly small form factor. Despite the small size, I have had no throttling issues while doing heavy tasks thus far. The keyboard is really easy to get used to and the big trackpad makes interacting with the device much more pleasing. One of the most underrated features of the 2018 model over the 2017 has got to be the True Tone screen: the auto white balance makes the screen easier on the eyes while creating a natural looking image despite the varying color temperature. If you want a portable Mac, this is as good as it gets. It is thin, fast and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Efe BERK

customer_reviews.title: A really good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to escape the Apple prison but products like this make it hard. I wanted a 15 inch laptop that was NOT widescreen because I use it for writing documents not watching movies. There's so little choice out there. The obvious competitor is Microsoft's Surface Book 2. But that's about the same price and has a detachable screen I don't need. Plus I can run Windows easily on this if I want. Some people hate the keyboard. I don't find it bad at all. Apple got my money again. It's a lovely piece of kit. Rats... caught again.
customer_reviews.author: Kento

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little machine
customer_reviews.text: I was the one who always argued about having an expensive macbook when you can have same configuration at cheaper price. This arugment continued for 3 years before i finally decided to give it a try. After using this i must say that this has not only replaced my windows laptops but tablets as well when i am at home. I am using this as workhorse and entertainment pad. Battery life : easily i get around 8-10 hours Screen: Perfect for editing photos Programs:- we are able run various development tools, photoshop apps without any degrade in performance No heat issues We love the machine.. Dont use it for gaming as we already have a desktop with nvidia titan x

customer_reviews.title: An amazing laptop, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a 2019 MacBook Pro 15" as an editing laptop, so mine has the 8-core i9, 32gb, and a pro graphics card. It is extremely fast, beautifully designed, and easy to use, and is very powerful (as you'd expect!). However, this did cost near £3200, so is NOT cheap- and I've already had to spend £40 on an adaptor just so I can import photos from an SD card- it only has thunderbolt 3/USB-C ports. So the laptop is perfect for what I need, but Apple's constant 'innovation' just means more money... can't fault the design, speed, hardware or the software though, and that is why I'll continue to buy Apple products.
